title: cant get into champion select
body: it's been 3 days since I encountered this problem whenever I'm into champion select.. i cant see any champion.. pls help me fix this problem.. thanks

replies.body:
We've seen most issues in champ select happen as a result of an *unstable connection* to the matchmaking servers. I'd recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common causes for this issue.

Please let me know if this resolved your issues.
